titleText: Harmon Kardon Invoke, First Take: More Cortana integrations and skills required

titleText: Microsoft's Whiteboard Preview app is all about collaboration
mainText: In the quest to release better collaboration tools, Microsoft released its Whiteboard Preview app in a private beta. The software lets teams mark up multiple boards with cute skeumorphic details to ease users into working.
